notesStmt.note: Missing the first five leaves in the first quire. Folios 167 and 168 are of recent date.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The revised recension of Maimonides' Sefer mitsṿot in the original Arabic, in Hebrew characters.

collation.p: Originally quires of 10 leaves each. Catchwords at the end of the quires.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script of the 15th to 16th century.
